name: HTMLIFrameElement.referrerPolicy
description: The HTMLIFrameElement.referrerPolicy property reflects the HTML referrerpolicy attribute of the iframe element defining which referrer is sent when fetching the resource.

refs.name: Referrer Policy
refs.description: The definition of 'referrerpolicy attribute' in Referrer Policy.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLIFrameElement: referrerPolicy' in HTML Living Standard.
